forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts a golden hue over Downtown San Francisco, this afternoon promises a rare treat with bright blue skies stretching toward the horizon. With a comforting warmth nudging toward a pleasant 70 degrees before tapering off to a cooler 64, the day culminates in an inviting atmosphere that beckons one outside. Gentle breezes from the west-southwest add a refreshing touch, while the clouds that typically cloak the Golden Gate and cradle the hills seem to have taken a hiatus, allowing the city to bask in clear visibility.

As evening approaches, expect a shift—a soft blanket of clouds will drift in, bringing a tender coolness that hugs the air down to about 52 degrees. With the wind continuing to whisper through the city, dressing in layers will serve you well; a light jacket for twilight strolls and perhaps a comfortable cardigan for the chill will ensure an enjoyable outing as the sun sets. Tonight’s embrace is perfect for a cozy walk along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet gathering with friends at an outdoor café, where the lingering warmth of the day meets the crisp evening air, inviting conversation and camaraderie to flourish under the unfolding night sky.
